entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:52 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
